dropDownCancelClicked.description:
Event is fired when Cancel button is clicked in drop down.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key for which Cancel button is clicked.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

dropDownClosed.description:
Event fired after the dropdown for a summary column is closed
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is closing.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

dropDownClosing.description:
Event fired before the dropdown for a summary column starts closing
   Return false in order to cancel closing the drop down.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is closing.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

dropDownOKClicked.description:
Event is fired when OK button is clicked in drop down
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key for which OK button is clicked.
   Use ui.eventData to get data about which summary methods are(not) selected. Format of event data is {type: 'min', active: false};
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

dropDownOpened.description:
Event fired after the summaries dropdown is opened for a specific column
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is shown.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

dropDownOpening.description:
Event fired before drop down is opened for a specific column summary
   Return false in order to cancel opening the drop down.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is opening.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

summariesCalculated.description:
Event fired after summaries calculation are completely made
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.data to get data for calculated summaries
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

summariesCalculating.description:
Event fired before summaries calculations are made
   Return false in order to cancel calculation of summaries.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

summariesMethodSelectionChanged.description:
Event fired when user selects/deselects summary method from checkbox
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where it is changed selection of summary method
   Use ui.isSelected to get whether method is selected or not
   Use ui.methodName to get summary method name
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

summariesToggled.description:
Event is fired after summary rows are toggled
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.isToShow to get whether summaries are shown or not.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

summariesToggling.description:
Event is fired bofore summary rows start toggling
   Return false in order to cancel showing/hiding of summaries.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.isToShow to get whether summaries are shown or not.
   Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

valueOptions.name: onselect
valueOptions.description: summaries are updated when checkbox is checked/unchecked

valueOptions.name: okcancelbuttons
valueOptions.description: summaries are updated only when OK button is clicked

callee.description: Function reference - it is called when data is retrieved from the data source

columnSettings.description: List of column settings that specifies custom summaries options per column basis

columnKey.description: Specifies the column key of the column with summary

columnIndex.description: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers

allowSummaries.description: Enables disables summaries for the column

rowDisplayLabel.description: Text of the summary method which is shown in summary cell

valueOptions.name: count
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using count function

valueOptions.name: min
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using min function

valueOptions.name: max
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using max function

valueOptions.name: sum
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using sum function

valueOptions.name: avg
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using average function

valueOptions.name: custom
valueOptions.description: The summaries are calculated using custom function

active.description: If it is false the summary operand will be shown in dropdown but it will not be made calculation

summaryCalculator.description: Name of the custom summary function which should be executed when type is custom

order.description: Specifies the order of elements in dropdown. It is recommended to set order of custom operands and to be greater or equal to 5

decimalDisplay.description: Specifies the number of digits after the decimal point for result of the current summary operand. This property will be ignored when isGridFormatter is true

isGridFormatter.description: Specifies whether to be used grid formatter for result for the current summary operand

compactRenderingMode.description: Specifies how compact the summaries are rendered.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: Will use True if the maximum number of visible summaries is one or less and False otherwise

valueOptions.name: true
valueOptions.description: Indicates that the summaries may be rendered compactly, even mixing different summaries on the same line.

valueOptions.name: false
valueOptions.description: Ensures that each summary type is occupying a separate line.

defaultDecimalDisplay.description: The number of digits after the decimal point. If gridFormatter is True then this option is ignored.

dialogButtonCancelText.description: Text of the button Cancel in the summaries dropdown

dialogButtonOKText.description: Text of the button OK in the summaries dropdown

dropDownHeight.description: Height of the dropdown in pixels

dropDownWidth.description: Width of the dropdown in pixels

emptyCellText.description: Empty text template to be shown for empty cells

featureChooserText.description: Get or set text that is shown in the feature chooser dropdown when summaries are hidden

featureChooserTextHide.description: Get or set text that is shown in the feauture chooser dropdown when summaries are shown

isGridFormatter.description: if this property is enabled and in summaryOperand isGridFormatter  is undefined then use grid formatting for cells

resultTemplate.description: Result template for summary result(shown in table cell)

showDropDownButton.description: Show/hide footer button(on click show/hide dropdown)

showSummariesButton.description: Show header button icon in the header cell. On click - shows/hides summaries

summariesHeaderButtonTooltip.description: Tooltip text for header cell button

summariesResponseKey.description: Result key by which we get data from the result returned by remote data source.

summaryExecution.description: Determines when the summary values are calculated when type is local

valueOptions.name: priortofilteringandpaging
valueOptions.description: Summaries are calculated prior to filtering and paging

valueOptions.name: afterfilteringbeforepaging
valueOptions.description: Summaries are calculated after filtering and before paging

valueOptions.name: afterfilteringandpaging
valueOptions.description: Summaries are calculated after filtering and paging

summaryExprUrlKey.description: Set key in GET Request for summaries - used only when type is remote

valueOptions.name: remote
valueOptions.description: when it is remote summaries calculations are made on the server

valueOptions.name: local
valueOptions.description: When it is local calculations are made on the client
